title: Nina Dobrev touches down in JFK with $4,400 tote before changing into chic coat and dress
text:
She never steps a foot wrong in the fashion department.

And Nina Dobrev proved that Sunday was no different when she was spotted touching down into JFK airport in New York City.

The 30-year-old dressed casually and kept a low profile with shades on despite being indoors.

Off-duty look: Nina Dobrev proved she had style both on and off the red carpet on Sunday when she was spotted touching down into JFK airport ahead of a press appearance on Monday morning

Nina hid her toned physique underneath a soft and comfortable striped sweater that featured shades of rust.

She teamed the look with straight legged trousers and some white platform sneakers.

The Vampire Diaries star accessorised with shades and a $4,400 Christian Dior tote bag and kept her $200 AirPods in her ears.

She's got style: The Vampire Diaries star accessorised with shades and a $4,400 Christian Dior tote bag and kept her $200 AirPods in her ears

Natural beauty: Nina's brunette tresses were styled out naturally and she appeared to be wearing no makeup

Nina's brunette tresses were styled out naturally and she appeared to be wearing no makeup.

The actress shared a sweet selfie from the plane where she rocked an animal print ensemble complete with a matching eye-mask.

'Goodmorning AND goodnight,' she captioned the makeup-free Boomerang video.

Resting: The actress shared a sweet selfie from the plane where she rocked an animal print ensemble complete with a matching eye-mask

REady for action: And Nina's beauty sleep appeared to have done wonders for her when she showcased her fashionista style early on Monday morning

And Nina's beauty sleep appeared to have done wonders for her when she showcased her fashionista style early on Monday morning.

The Fam star rocked a collared checkered playsuit that was complete with cuffs on her wrists.

She wore a camel colored overcoat over the top and completed her leggy display with beige pumps.

Stylish: The Fam star rocked a collared checkered playsuit that was complete with cuffs on her wrists

TV ready! The complete look saw her don a soft smokey eye, contoured cheekbones and a nude lip for her appearance on LIVE with Kelly and Ryan

Nina's brunette tresses were slicked back off of her face with her makeup kept natural but radiant.

Taking to her social media, she shared some photos and videos of the getting ready process, starting her day with some coffee, food, her teddy bear and de-puffing eye-masks at 6:15 am.

The complete look saw her don a soft smokey eye, contoured cheekbones and a nude lip for her appearance on LIVE with Kelly and Ryan.

Early start: Taking to her social media, she shared some photos and videos of the getting ready process, starting her day with some coffee, food, her teddy bear and de-puffing eye-masks at 6:15 am

Nina is currently in New York as part of a press tour for her latest flick, Lucky Day - an action-crime-thriller set to be released on October 11.

The movie began filming in Canada back in September 2017.

The synopsis sees: 'Red [Luke Bracey], a safe cracker who has just been released from prison, is trying to hold his family together as his past catches up with him in the form of Luc [Crispin Glover], a psychopathic contract killer who's seeking revenge for the death of his brother.'

Nina plays Red's wife, Chloe.
description: Nina Dobrev proved she had style both on and off the red carpet on Sunday when she was spotted touching down into JFK airport ahead of a press appearance on Monday morning.
